name: Water Art: Sea Burst
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Water bursts from below you in a 15 foot radius surrounding you. Every creature you choose within this range must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 bludgeoning damage per point of proficiency modifier you have and fall prone. On a success, they take half damage and are not knocked prone.

You can't cast this spell unless it is from a ninja scroll.
empower: Damage die increased to d8. If you are 9th level or higher, damage die increased to d10 instead.
